expo.name: HereHere
expo.description: version 1.6.5: Location based chat application - Find or lookup a place on the map and chat with people who are there.  See users list with personal or business taglines - if you're interested, send a message and meet with the person there.  If you're just looking to find a hot spot, you can also decide whether to head there or check out some place else by getting real time updates from people who are there.
